attributes.action: Stop the closure of the DLI museum by Durham county council
attributes.additional_details: We owe our tomorrow's because they gave their today's . we are talking about hundreds of years of history belonging to the regiment to be see by all not just the most popular medal's its there for all to see . please show your support for the DLI sign the petition save them as the fought to save us . this time  pen vs sword ......
attributes.background: Durham Council want to close the DLI museum and put part of the collection into the university of Durham at palace green everything else into storage. Never to be seen again

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This museum is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: 
http://democracy.durham.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
